isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - INVERSION VALVE (BENDIX SR-1) - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: CLEAN AND INSPECT
svcproc.para: Wash all metal parts in cleaning solvent. Use compressed air to dry parts. Inspect all parts for serviceability. Inspect the valve seats for nicks or burrs. Check the springs for cracks or corrosion. Replace all rubber parts and all unserviceable parts.
